rooms.name: Royal Ambassador Suite
rooms.description: Experience peak high-rise luxury. This expansive suite features a master bedroom with panoramic city skyline views, a sleek marble bathroom, and a modern private lounge with a marble kitchen bar.

rooms.name: Ambassador Luxury Suite
rooms.description: Designed for the modern executive. Enjoy a plush king-sized bed, a glass-enclosed rain shower, and a minimalist lounge area overlooking the sparkling downtown district at night.

rooms.name: Standard Suite
rooms.description: A sleek, contemporary retreat. The Standard Suite offers a serene sleeping area, smart-room lighting controls, and a functional workspace positioned right by the window.

rooms.name: Majestic Heritage Suite
rooms.description: A fusion of classic warmth and skyscraper modernity. This suite features dark walnut panels against massive glass windows, offering a sophisticated contrast to the city lights.

rooms.name: Presidential Penthouse
rooms.description: The crown jewel of CHMSUOTEL. The Penthouse spans the highest floor, boasting uninterrupted 360-degree city views, a private high-altitude balcony, and a massive kitchen lounge.

rooms.name: Ocean View Deluxe
rooms.description: Situated on the coastal-facing side of the tower. This high-rise room features an unobstructed view of the bay meeting the city edge, complete with a glass-enclosed viewing shower.

rooms.name: Executive Twin Room
rooms.description: Ideal for business travelers. Featuring two ultra-comfortable twin beds, high-speed corporate Wi-Fi, and a sleek modern desk setup perfect for productivity.

rooms.name: Cozy Single Room
rooms.description: A minimalist haven for the solo adventurer. Though compact, this room spares no luxury, offering automated blackout blinds and a brightly lit modern shower.
